import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../store/CartContext' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import classes from './Cart.module.css' const Cart=(props)=>{ const cartctx=useContext(CartContext); const totalamount=`$${cartctx.totalamount.toFixed(2)}`; const hasitems=cart const cartitems=
    {cartctx.item.map((item) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
return {cartitems}
Total Amount {totalamount}
} export default Cart;
